SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.math.quaternion

Class QuaternionBuilder

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.quaternion.QuaternionBuilder
public final class QuaternionBuilder extends Object
A builder class for building rotation quaternions.

Note that this is not a builder in accordance to the builder design pattern, and building a quaternion using this class should not be done during runtime.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QuaternionBuilder()
    Starts the building sequence from the identity quaternion.
    QuaternionBuilder(Quaternion quaternion)
    Starts the building sequence from an existing quaternion.
